Blight Treant: .This. place. is. where. the. great. blight. treants. settled. 66. corpses. of. Elves. our. ancestors. rooted. over. their. bodies. and. grew. by. drinking. their. blood. The. King. of. the. black. willows. in. the. Swampland. cast. his. greedy. eyes. on. our. land. The. black. willow. lurker. in the Swampland. shall. never. be. forgiven.
